#include<stdio.h>

int bit_count(long long int x)
{
    int bits = 0;
    while(x)
    {
        bits += (x&1);
        x = x >> 1;
    }
    return bits;
}

long long int set_bit(long long int x)
{
    long long int b = 1;
    while(b&x)
        b = b << 1;
    x = x | b;
    return x;
}
void print(long long int x)
{

    //long long int b = 1 << 30;
    //printf("%lld\n",b);
    //while(b&x == 0)
      //  b = b >> 1;
    //printf("%lld",b);
    while(x > 0)
    {
        printf("%d",x%2);
        x = x/2;
    }
    printf("\n");
}

long long int ans(long long int l, long long int r)
{
    long long int tmp,curr;
    tmp = curr = l;
    while(tmp <= r)
    {
        curr = tmp;
        tmp = set_bit(tmp);
    }
    return curr;
}

/*int main()
{
    long long int x;
    scanf("%lld",&x);
    //printf("%d\n",sizeof(long long int));
    print(x);
    return 0;
}*/

int main()
{
    long long int n,l,r,o;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    while(n--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&l,&r);
        //scanf("%lld",&l);
        o = ans(l,r);
        printf("%lld\n",o);
        //print(l);
        //print(r);
        //print(o);
    }
    return 0;
}
